lib.title: Minerva UI
lib.description: A modern React component library for building beautiful and accessible user interfaces
lib.about.description: Minerva UI is a comprehensive React component library that provides a set of reusable, accessible, and customizable components to help you build modern web applications.
lib.installation.title: Installation
lib.installation.description: Get started with Minerva UI by installing it in your project.
lib.installation.usage.title: Usage
lib.installation.usage.description: Import and use components in your React application.
lib.installation.requirements.title: Requirements
lib.installation.cdn.title: CDN
lib.installation.cdn.description: You can also use Minerva UI directly from a CDN.

modern.title: Modern Design
modern.description: Built with modern design principles and best practices in mind.

customizable.title: Highly Customizable
customizable.description: Easily customize components to match your brand and design system.

typescript.title: TypeScript Support
typescript.description: Written in TypeScript with full type support for better development experience.

performance.title: Performance Focused
performance.description: Optimized for performance with minimal bundle size and efficient rendering.

getStarted.title: Get Started
getStarted.description: Start building your next project with Minerva UI components.

installation.title: Installation
installation.description: Get started with Minerva UI by installing it in your project

package.title: Package Installation
package.description: Install Minerva UI using your preferred package manager

setup.title: Project Setup
setup.description: Set up Minerva UI in your React application

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: A modern React UI library for building beautiful and accessible interfaces

modern.title: Modern Design
modern.description: Built with modern design principles and best practices in mind.

performance.title: Performance First
performance.description: Optimized for performance with minimal bundle size and efficient rendering.

theme.title: Theme Support
theme.description: Comprehensive theme system that allows you to customize every aspect of the components.

responsive.title: Responsive Design
responsive.description: Components are designed to work seamlessly across all device sizes.

quickstart.title: Quick Start
quickstart.description: Get started quickly with Minerva UI by installing the package and importing components.

support.title: Browser Support
support.description: Minerva UI is compatible with all modern browsers.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description: Learn about Minerva UI's features and capabilities

what.title: What is Minerva UI
what.description: Minerva UI is a modern React component library designed to help you build beautiful and accessible user interfaces quickly and efficiently.

components.title: Rich Component Library
components.description: A comprehensive set of pre-built components that follow best practices in design and accessibility.

customization.title: Highly Customizable
customization.description: Flexible theming system that allows you to customize every aspect of the components to match your brand.

typescript.title: TypeScript Support
typescript.description: Built with TypeScript for better development experience with full type support and code completion.

theming.title: Theming
theming.description: Customize the look and feel of your components

button.title: Button
button.description: Buttons allow users to take actions, and make choices, with a single tap.
button.installation_description: Install the button component using your package manager.

variant.name: variant
variant.description: The visual style of the button. Each variant has its own semantic meaning: primary for main actions, secondary for less important actions, success for confirmations, warning for cautious actions, error for destructive actions, retry for retry operations, and back for navigation.

size.name: size
size.description: The size of the button. Small is suitable for tight spaces, medium for general use, large for emphasis, and xlarge for prominent actions.

shape.name: shape
shape.description: The shape of the button. Square has sharp corners, rounded has soft corners, and circle is perfectly round.

borderRadius.name: borderRadius
borderRadius.description: Custom border radius of the button. Can be a predefined value or a specific number in pixels.

disabled.name: disabled
disabled.description: Whether the button is disabled. Disabled buttons can't be clicked and appear faded.

loading.name: loading
loading.description: Whether the button is in loading state. Shows a spinner and prevents clicks while loading.

active.name: active
active.description: Whether the button is in active state. Active buttons appear pressed.

onClick.name: onClick
onClick.description: Callback function triggered when the button is clicked.

children.name: children
children.description: The content to be displayed inside the button. Can be text, icons, or other elements.

className.name: className
className.description: Additional CSS class names to be added to the button.

ariaLabel.name: ariaLabel
ariaLabel.description: Accessible label for screen readers. Important for buttons that only contain icons.

basic.title: Basic Usage
basic.description: The most basic usage of a button. Use the primary variant for main actions.

variants.title: Button Variants
variants.description: Different styles of buttons for different purposes. Choose the appropriate variant based on the action's importance and meaning.

sizes.title: Button Sizes
sizes.description: Buttons come in four sizes: small for compact layouts, medium for general use, large for emphasis, and xlarge for prominent actions.

shapes.title: Button Shapes
shapes.description: Buttons can have different shapes to match your design needs. Square for a traditional look, rounded for a modern feel, and circle for icon buttons.

borderRadius.title: Border Radius
borderRadius.description: Customize the corner roundness of buttons. Use predefined values or specify a custom radius in pixels.

states.title: Button States
states.description: Buttons can be in different states: normal, loading (shows a spinner), disabled (can't be clicked), and active (appears pressed).

withIcons.title: Buttons with Icons
withIcons.description: Buttons can include icons to enhance visual communication. Icons can be placed before or after the text.

block.title: Block Button
block.description: A block button spans the full width of its container. Useful for mobile interfaces or when you want to align button width with other elements.

customStyles.title: Custom Styles
customStyles.description: Buttons can be customized with your own styles using CSS. Here are some examples of custom styled buttons.

switch.title: Switch
switch.description: Switch toggles allow users to turn an option on or off.

alert.title: Alert
alert.description: Alerts display important messages to users.

textfield.title: Text Field
textfield.description: Text fields let users enter and edit text.

value.name: value
value.description: The value of the text field.

placeholder.name: placeholder
placeholder.description: Placeholder text when the field is empty.

disabled.name: disabled
disabled.description: Whether the text field is disabled.

error.name: error
error.description: Whether the text field is in error state.

size.name: size
size.description: The size of the text field.

radio.title: Radio
radio.description: Radio buttons allow users to select one option from a set.

checkbox.title: Checkbox
checkbox.description: Checkboxes allow users to select one or more items from a set.

avatar.title: Avatar
avatar.description: Avatars represent users or entities with images or initials.

badge.title: Badge
badge.description: Badges are small status descriptors for UI elements.

card.title: Card
card.description: Cards contain content and actions about a single subject.

chip.title: Chip
chip.description: Chips represent small blocks of information.

divider.title: Divider
divider.description: Dividers separate content into clear groups.

dropdown.title: Dropdown
dropdown.description: Dropdowns display a list of actions or options.

message.title: Message
message.description: Messages provide feedback about user operations.

progress.title: Progress
progress.description: Progress indicators express an unspecified wait time.

skeleton.title: Skeleton
skeleton.description: Skeleton screens provide a low-fidelity representation of content before it's loaded.

searchButton.title: Search Button
searchButton.description: A special button for triggering search operations

statusIndicator.title: Status Indicator
statusIndicator.description: Display the current status of an element

iconButton.title: Icon Button
iconButton.description: Icon buttons are buttons that only contain icons, typically used in toolbars or compact interfaces.

pagination.title: Pagination
pagination.description: A long list can be divided into several pages using Pagination, and only one page will be loaded at a time.

sizes.title: Different Sizes
sizes.description: Three sizes are available: small, medium (default) and large.

shapes.title: Different Shapes
shapes.description: Three shapes are available: square, rounded (default) and circle.

variants.title: Different Variants
variants.description: Three variants are available: filled (default), outlined and text.

more.title: More Features
more.description: More features like quick jumper, size changer and total display.

simple.title: Simple Mode
simple.description: Simple mode will show less page items.

responsive.title: Responsive
responsive.description: In responsive mode, items will be hidden on small screens.

properties.title: Properties
properties.onChange: Callback when page or pageSize changes
properties.showSizeChanger: Whether to show page size changer
properties.itemRender: Custom render function for page items
properties.totalRender: Custom render function for total text

error.title: Oops!
error.description: Sorry, an unexpected error has occurred.

notFound.description: Oops! The page you're looking for doesn't exist.
